nodes.text: A male member of the Human species served at one point in their life as the military governor of Daschua. The governor had several sons, the eldest of whom was named Zertik Strom, who went on to serve in the Imperial Navy.

Zertik Strom's father was first mentioned in the second entry of Viva Space Vegas! The History of the Marvelous Wheel, a pair of articles released in 2013 on the StarWars.com blog and written by Abel G. Peña and Rich Handley. The article does not name the character or make clear what type of location Daschua is.
